title: Battle Athletess Daiundoukai ReSTART!
synopsis: As technology advanced, humanity gradually colonized the entire solar system, occupying planetary facilities from Mercury to Pluto. This results in a large-scale athletic tournament, the "Daiundoukai," where several aspiring female athletes from all around the solar system compete. The winner of the tournament is crowned the "Cosmo Beauty," obtaining a queenlike status.
characters: ['Akehoshi, Kanata', 'Wong, Shelley', 'Garenstein, Eva', 'Respighi, Paglia', 'Gurtland, Lydia', 'Christopher, Yana']
voices: ['Morohoshi, Sumire', 'Tomita, Miyu', 'Ishikawa, Yui', 'Nanjou, Hikaru', 'Kitou, Akari', 'Hayami, Saori']
